file_content.text: So you beat Wilkes and made it outta the desert alive, huh.
Wilkes doesn't surprise me, but when I heard you were heading for the desert... well, I wasn't expecting to see either of you again.
You seriously underestimate me.
Give me some credit.
Andronikos turned out to be an okay fighter after all.
Give the guy some credit.
Better than okay, huh. I got my share of them Sand People.
Wasn't meant as an insult. There's lots of stuff in that desert that can't be fought, and it's just as deadly.
I brought Andronikos back!
Surprise!
Heh. You should stick with this one, Andronikos. You might learn a sense of humor.
Lookit, I have a sense of humor--
Relax. It was a joke.
Anyway, I'm glad you came because it gives me a chance to thank you for taking out that runt Wilkes.
With some real leadership, maybe the Exchange on Tatooine can move ahead for a change.
Good luck with that.
Have fun.
Thanks. I'm hopeful.
Thanks for your help.
No problem. Any time, hey.
Don't go expecting any more favors.
I didn't do it for you.
I don't plan on needing any.
And Andronikos--I'm sorry.
It's alright, huh. We wouldn't have worked out anyway. All that shouting and throwing stuff--somebody was bound to get hurt.
Heh. Right, well, guess it's goodbye, then. Good luck out there.
What was that all about?
I'm confused.
Nothing. Just saying goodbye, is all.
Let's go cause some trouble.
Thought she'd never leave!
Finally!
Hey, she was as good a tech as you'll ever find on a pirate gunship. And not a bad girl, either.
Don't worry. I'll make you forget about her real fast.
[Flirt] At last, she's gone.
Heh. I get the feeling we're going to make a damn good team, you and me.
Now let's get off this rock, huh.
You tell Andronikos what I told you. Wilkes is waiting "out of ether's view."
Casey Rix? Andronikos sent me. He said you know where to find Sylas Wilkes.
Andronikos? You mean he's out of prison? He doing alright?
And he's after Wilkes. Figures. Andronikos doesn't really forgive or forget.
Hey, you're not planning to harm him, are you?
I promise not to hurt him.
Don't worry.
Okay then.
It won't be your fault if something happens to him.
Your conscience is clean.
I guess that's the best I'm going to get from you, huh.
Tell me where Wilkes is or I will kill him.
It's up to you if he gets hurt.
Oh come on, please, not really.
I'll tell you where to find that son of a Hutt. In fact, I'll make sure he's there so you can kill him.
Wilkes's base is hidden "out of ether's view." Andronikos will know what I mean.
"Out of ether's view." I think I can remember that.
Got it.
Good.
You sure Andronikos will know?
Really?
"Out of ether's view" is pirate slang.
Can't you give me something a little... clearer?
That's nonsense.
I can't have everyone on Tatooine knowing where the base is.
I can't have everyone on Tatooine knowing where the base is.
Let me call Wilkes, make sure he stays put. It'd be a shame for you to storm HQ while he's out.
Don't do anything you'll regret.
No tricky business now.
Like warn Wilkes? We both know that'd be suicide.
I appreciate your help.
Thank you.
Watch me work.
I'd like to see the famous Wilkes.
Sure.
He's not that impressive. You just gotta know how to handle him.
Casey! Sweetheart! Got something to report? Andronikos hasn't turned up, has he?
Oh, Sy, what do I have to do to make you stop worrying about Andronikos?
Well, I can think of a few things. Have you reconsidered my offer?
That's why I called. Are you free in, say, a couple hours? We could talk about it--in person.
I always have time for you. I'll be right here, sweetheart. Whenever you're ready.
Ugh, I hate that guy. Andronikos never went for that eyelash-batting junk. But Wilkes is there. So hurry up and kill him.
This should prove most helpful.
Thank you.
It's nothing.
I found that whole exchange deeply disturbing.
I wish I hadn't seen that.
It's not as bad as it looks.
A little goes a long way with Wilkes's brand of self-love.
You--I mean--you aren't really...?
I hope that was fake.
No! I've been able to string him along so far without it.
But I won't shed any tears when he's gone, to say the least.
Sorry, I'm too busy to talk right now.
I don't have any business with you.
